Text: I got rid of the other one. I realized that some parts of the game, the audio gets a little skippy, and sometimes the music will switch for no reason, due to the disc being scratched. This rip is from a brand new DVD, so it's all good now :)
I haven't stopped seeding since I put the torrent up.
